participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Sophie is creative and enjoys expressing herself through her fashion choices. She's energetic and enthusiastic about music and gaming.
participant_1.background: my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. i'm a blonde girl with really short hair. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games. i love wearing skinny jeans and leggings. i'm rather skinny as i like to stay in shape.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is outgoing and sociable, always looking for the next party. He has a playful side but also a serious fear of heights.
participant_2.background: my favorite movie is mean girls. i own a cat and a dog. i'm a party animal. i am deathly afraid of heights.

content.text: Hey, are you here? What's up?
